info.name: Tumblr - Black & White Flower Theme
info.description: A theme for your dashboard~ Feel free to delete the greyscale section if you wan't colored icons.
info.additionalInfo:
2015.10.21: Fixed the blue under the avatar and on the sidebar.
2014.07.24: Fixed the new post background, and changed it back to white.
2014.10.28: Fixed the new search bar.
2014.10.30: Fixed the new header.
